summary: copy lines into clipboard with the line numbers
name: nclipper.vim
description:
Start visual mode with `V` and select some lines.

http://gyazo.com/ef8121528e4a269ce894e25c289b489a.png

Type `<C-y>`

http://gyazo.com/2b56de0c4f7603df7a00e9845704b39c.png

Now your clipboard or Vim register `"+` has the lines you selected with line numbers. Paste it anywhere you want!

http://gyazo.com/5000e1cca5ad81203541fb7e3ce82a50.png

Contributor: tyru

The development is in github. https://github.com/ujihisa/nclipper.vim
install_details: Unarchive and put it into a dir of your &rtp.

versions.release_notes: Align line numbers and format option `g:nclipper_format`
